text:
@ACTBrigitte @YeOldHongKonger I just hope that @ladygaga need to do some hoeeork and acknowledge that it was the “Superstars” :  #WHO , @DrTedros,  #CCP whom delayed the response to declare #WuhanVirus a pandemic causing deaths of over 158,000 to the world.

#CCP_is_terrorist #Chinamustfall https://t.co/gSrICG1GmX

entity.name: One World: Together at Home
entity.description: Global Citizen presents One World: Together at Home, a global special curated in collaboration with Lady Gaga and featuring your favorite artists and comedians — all in support of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the health care workers on the frontlines of the COVID-19 crisis⁠.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
